author: xtqqczze
body:
According to documentation, only Visual Studio v16.6 (latest preview) is supported for .NET 5 preview, however using v16.6.0 Preview 4.0, the PowerShell solution fails to open.

```
Unsupported
This version of Visual Studio is unable to open the following projects. The project types may not be installed or this version of Visual Studio may not support them. 
For more information on enabling these project types or otherwise migrating your assets, please see the details in the "Migration Report" displayed after clicking OK.
	 - powershell-win-core, "X:\PowerShell\src\powershell-win-core\powershell-win-core.csproj"
	 - System.Management.Automation, "X:\PowerShell\src\System.Management.Automation\System.Management.Automation.csproj"
	 - Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.Utility, "X:\PowerShell\src\Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.Utility\Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.Utility.csproj"
	 - Microsoft.PowerShell.CoreCLR.Eventing, "X:\PowerShell\src\Microsoft.PowerShell.CoreCLR.Eventing\Microsoft.PowerShell.CoreCLR.Eventing.csproj"
	 - Microsoft.PowerShell.ConsoleHost, "X:\PowerShell\src\Microsoft.PowerShell.ConsoleHost\Microsoft.PowerShell.ConsoleHost.csproj"
	 - Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.Management, "X:\PowerShell\src\Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.Management\Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.Management.csproj"
	 - Microsoft.PowerShell.SDK, "X:\PowerShell\src\Microsoft.PowerShell.SDK\Microsoft.PowerShell.SDK.csproj"
	 - Microsoft.Management.Infrastructure.CimCmdlets, "X:\PowerShell\src\Microsoft.Management.Infrastructure.CimCmdlets\Microsoft.Management.Infrastructure.CimCmdlets.csproj"
	 - Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.Diagnostics, "X:\PowerShell\src\Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.Diagnostics\Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.Diagnostics.csproj"
	 - Microsoft.WSMan.Management, "X:\PowerShell\src\Microsoft.WSMan.Management\Microsoft.WSMan.Management.csproj"
	 - Microsoft.PowerShell.Security, "X:\PowerShell\src\Microsoft.PowerShell.Security\Microsoft.PowerShell.Security.csproj"
	 - Microsoft.WSMan.Runtime, "X:\PowerShell\src\Microsoft.WSMan.Runtime\Microsoft.WSMan.Runtime.csproj"
	 - powershell-unix, "X:\PowerShell\src\powershell-unix\powershell-unix.csproj"
	 - Microsoft.PowerShell.MarkdownRender, "X:\PowerShell\src\Microsoft.PowerShell.MarkdownRender\Microsoft.PowerShell.MarkdownRender.csproj"
	 - xUnit.tests, "X:\PowerShell\test\xUnit\xUnit.tests.csproj"


No changes required
These projects can be opened in Visual Studio 2015, Visual Studio 2013, Visual Studio 2012, and Visual Studio 2010 SP1 without changing them.
	 - PowerShell, "X:\PowerShell\PowerShell.sln"


```

comments.author: xtqqczze
comments.body: Opened successfully once .NET desktop environment workload was installed.

title: Solution fails to open using Visual Studio v16.6 Preview
